moves.1... e5 2. e4 b6 3. d4: We come into pawn action as I try to control the center
moves.5. Nc3 Bb4: Pinning, and still looking at getting my pawn- removing the defender
moves.9. Be2 Qxg2: There goes my rook, but in about 8 more moves, I get a rook back
moves.10. O-O-O: I was watching this for a 10.Re1, optional, 11.Bf3, getting the queen
moves.12. Qa3: putting presure on e7, and keeping on the 3rd rank for the future attack
moves.12... d6 13. Nf3: The rook attacks, she needs to get out
moves.13... Qg2 14. Bd2: Ya see how keeping on the 3rd rank is helping me?!?
moves.15... Qxf2 16. Bxa8: Yay white, yay white- I'm not getting as slaughtered as usual
moves.16... Qf6: Sorry, my pawn's not for sale!
moves.17. Qa4+ Kd8 18. d5: That, unfortunately, blocked in my bishop
moves.18... a5 19. h4 h6 20. Bc3 Qf2 21. Bc6 N: I was looking at a mate in 3, that he avoided- well, not mate, but I would come out a knight ahead in the experience
moves.25. Qxc5 dxc5 26. a4: I need to go for proomotion, a knight under
moves.28... Re4 29. Ra1 Na5 30. b3 f5: He's also going for promotion- oh no!
